title: SBI plans to open 400 branches in FY25: Chairman Dinesh Khara
description: Asked about the monetisation of subsidiaries, Khara said that SBI would wait for them to further scale up their operations before listing them. Scaling up their operation will increase valuation and ensure better returns for the parent SBI.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
